text: Will Ireland Vint (born October 12, 2001) is an American soccer player who plays for USL Championship club Colorado Springs Switchbacks on loan from Colorado Rapids == Club career == Vint was scouted and signed by English Premier League side Manchester United, during his U15 season. Between February 2017 and August 2018, Vint played over 3,200 minutes in 56 matches for United's U15, U16, and U17 sides. In December, 2017, Vint was awarded a scholarship to stay with the club for his U17 and U18 seasons, but was forced to leave shortly after United's U18 pre-season camp due to family visa issues. He returned to the United States in August 2018 and joined Atlanta United's academy. Vint went on to make sixteen appearances and score one goal for Atlanta United 2 during the 2019 USL Championship season. On August 20, 2019, Vint then left Atlanta and returned to his home state to join the Colorado Rapids Academy. On March 4, 2020, Colorado Rapids announced it had signed Vint to a Homegrown Player contract after acquiring his homegrown rights from Atlanta United in exchange for a 2022 SuperDraft fourth round pick. == References == ==External links== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Atlanta United 2 players Category:Colorado Rapids players Category:USL Championship players Category:Soccer players from Colorado Category:United States men's youth international soccer players Category:Homegrown Players (MLS)
title: Will Vint
